summary: Most frontend gameplay requirements appear implemented (UI layout, OpenTDB fetching with token renewal, leveling/progress bar, localStorage persistence, share flow, and background music). However, there are likely gaps/violations around required English-only control labels (mute/play) and the visual theme constraint (blue-toned button). Additionally, unrequested backend and immutable-path files were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: The mute/play toggle control label is English-only (no emoji characters).
missing_requirements.reason: The header music toggle is icon-only (VolumeX/Volume2) with no visible English text label shown in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply a coherent emerald/green primary theme and avoid a blue/purple primary theme.
missing_requirements.reason: The level-up overlay 'SHARE' button uses a distinctly blue hue (OKLCH hue ~220), which conflicts with the requirement to avoid blue/purple primary theming.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty backend Motoko actor (backend/main.mo) even though backend changes were not required.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states backend changes are not required for this request; adding a backend file is unrequested scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/changed files under paths that were declared immutable (useActor.ts, main.tsx, useInternetIdentity.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify these frontend paths must not be edited; the diff shows these files being added.
